alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 7:25PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elmore and east central Owyhee Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 724 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms centered near Hot Springs Creek Reservoir, or 9 miles southeast of Mountain Home, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Blair Trail Reservoir and Tollgate around 740 PM MDT. Bennett Mountain around 750 PM MDT. Deer Heaven Mountain around 800 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Upper Treasure Valley
